author: andschwa
body: Per #1002, it looks like the full `ConsoleHost` may not be emitting exit codes properly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@vors it was the old host. Looks like the new host works properly and would have caught this:

``` sh
$ powershell -c 'import-module foo'
import-module : The specified module 'foo' was not loaded because no valid module file was found in any module directory.
At line:1 char:1
+ import-module foo
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (foo:String) [Import-Module], FileNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : Modules_ModuleNotFound,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand

$ echo $?
1
```

title: Test PowerShell exit code
